name: Brainstorm Browser
short_description:
Using something I've made? http://www.arrall.com Please, consider contributing in some way to any app I'm working on.

An online, multiuser, data collection, rating, and brainstorming app. Browse an example as a guest account at  http://www.arrall.com/bb/

It is based around 'boxes' that act like a file and a folder. They store information like a file (title, description, YouTube, image, or web link.). They can also act like a folder by containing other boxes. It looks and acts similar to your computer's desktop.

The boxes have a popularity, similar to Facebook's Like or Google's +1, and the contents of a box can be viewed either by popularity or by the owner's positioning layout.

When it works, you can switch to full screen mode through the button at the top, and then use your mousewheel to zoom in and out as well as drag the background to move about the scene.
